Mission

Vegas Stay objective is to provide the best degree of hospitality services in order to meet the demands and expectations of its guests. Our goal is to create Vegas Stay a meeting place, a location of business success, a place of pleasant gatherings, and a site of grand festivities.

Value

We are guided, in our every action, by moral principles.”Joy, Care and Innovation” These three core values define First Hotels' way of working. Our values reflect how we treat each other, our customers and our business partners. We seek employees who share these values and believe in our way of working. which are inspired by perpetual and unfading values.

Vision

Our vision's concept is to continue to implement and set the highest service quality standards in order to justify and uphold our reputation among guests, partners, competitors, and the general public. In order to maintain a balance with nature while also meeting the needs of modern society, we use and continually introduce environmentally friendly technology and procedures. Tradition is a monument to our success, but we also want to embrace the changes that contemporary times offer in order to become more marketable and exciting to our guests and partners in the future.

Feel Like Home
